base_description: Gray cabinet with two doors and a drawer.
part_description: One large drawer at the top, two doors below. Drawer spans width, doors are side by side.
internal_interaction_description: The drawer slides open and closed, supported by internal tracks. The doors swing on hinges, allowing access to the interior storage space. Each door has a handle for easy opening.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet is placed against a wall, providing storage for various items. Users interact by pulling the drawer and opening the doors using the handles. The cabinet can be part of a kitchen or bathroom setup.
